scripts.build: npm run lint && tsc && vite build && mv dist/main.html dist/index.html && cp public/mframe.json mframe.json && npm run compile
scripts.build:windows: npm run lint && tsc && vite build && move dist/main.html dist/index.html && copy public/mframe.json mframe.json && npm run compile
scripts.compile: cp dist/index.html index.html  && mtemplate compile && rm mframe.json index.html
scripts.compile:windows: copy dist/index.html  index.html  && mtemplate compile && del mframe.json index.html
scripts.lint: npm run lint:style && npm run lint:formatting
